description: A straight fit designed to accommodate an athletic build or offer a roomier style for a lean body type. Classic looking denim with the integration of stretch, their signature gusset, and performance fibres for all day comfort and style. Complete with temperature regulating and antimicrobial properties to stay fresh-feeling, cool and dry.
name: Duer Performance Denim Athletic Straight Pants, 32" Inseam - Wash - Mens
